channel.title: Close
channel.description:
Seems I must of done something with the Database to screw it up, put a new one in, works fine..
Thanks everyone for your help :)

item.title: Close
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

all day:

Jamez you came to Mopar for halp. yay

Ya… first time in… ages :
Only cause I can’t find whats wrong with this problem…

[quote=“omfg i own, post:5, topic:363943”] [java] java.sql.SQLException: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check t
he manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to
use near ‘=789,x='452,y='213,x5='0,y5='0,r='440',pt1='1',pt
2='0',f’ at line 1: ‘UPDATE rscd_players SET combat=59, v2recordwin=0,
skill_total=789,x='452,y='213,x5='0,y5='0,r='440',pt1='1',p
t2='0',fatigue='220',muted='0',haircolour=0,topcolour=2,trouserco
lour=8,v2recordloss=0,skincolour=14,headsprite=0,bodysprite=0,mal
e=0,skulled=2203287552000,combatstyle=0 WHEREuser`=1311’
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.net.DatabaseConnection.updateQuery(DatabaseC
onnection.java:109)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.model.PlayerSave.save(PlayerSave.java:519)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.loginserver.PlayerSaveHandler.
handlePacket(PlayerSaveHandler.java:65)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.processIncomingPackets(LoginEngi
ne.java:129)
[java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.run(LoginEngine.java:55)
[java] Java Result: 1[/quote]
GTFO?

Something to do with loading the player, you can make the same thing happen by entering shit into SQL that the server doesn’t expect for example.

Yeah… thing is I never touched anything… I will have a look at it in a few hours

Read full topic

There’s no errors, the server compiles perfectly, and runs perfectly.
